storyInfo: Erato begins writing a new poem, and decides to source her material from Rhodes Island.

attributes.content: *glug* *glug*—
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Hah, how intoxicating the aroma of fine wine is.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Open up, Erato.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Erato—you won't get anywhere even if you shut yourself inside. I suggest you give up.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Everyone and their mother can hear you, you binge-drinking priestess.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: I'm merely worried about you, Erato.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Last night, while I was enjoying my wine, by chance I overheard the conversation of a few operators. I heard you've locked yourself in your room for two full days and nights now.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: As a priestess, naturally I am concerned. Look, the morning sunlight has only just reached your windowsill, and I am already come to visit.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Visit? ...What's that you're holding?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Fine wine.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: O Mountains of Minos, would you grant me your blessings, and keep those with poor taste in alcohol far away?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Seeing how you still have the strength for sarcasm, I take it your new poem is coming along nicely?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: ...How did you know I'm working on a new poem?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: You've been idling about ever since your arrival in Rhodes Island... What are you planning to write?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: A long epic. One about a number of heroes with a variety of talents and personalities, who together lead the oppressed in their quest to triumph over their hardships and reach a land of hope... or something like that.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Sadly... writer's block.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Beset by a blank page then?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: That's not true! I... I finished the title!
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: I had three heroes in mind so far: an adept warrior, a genius smith, and a gracious healer...
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Maybe because it's been a while since I wrote, but I can't quite grasp the characters, and the story I had in mind is also lacking in realism. I'm finding it hard to establish their characters too... I need more inspiration.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Perhaps we can let the wine flow while we discuss these heroic legends, just like we do back home?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: And loosened by wine, surely you'll be plucking inspiration like apples from the tree of wisdom.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Please don't make up excuses to drink that wine you brought.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Maybe leaf through some literature then, or take a stroll outside? No doubt you know the ways of the Minoan poets better than I.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Of course. Can't you see I was getting ready to leave in search of heroics?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Speaking of heroics, aside from our homeland, Victoria and Kazimierz should both be wonderful places for inspiration too. Among your many choices.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I won't be going anywhere that far. I already have a place in mind.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Let's chat another time. I need to hurry.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Hold on.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: What else do you want?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: I've always been very interested in how you write your poems.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Given how rarely such an opportunity presents itself, surely you wouldn't refuse if I proposed to join you on your journey?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Fine, follow me.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: This is my first stop.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: What a surprise. So you never even planned to leave Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Of course not. There's more than enough inspiration on board.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: And when it comes to finding masterful warriors, where better than the training room?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: But did we come too early? There doesn't seem to be anyone here...
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Hah! How about that?
Someone's speaking.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Yes, I also have ears— Hello?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Take this!
Oh, it's Flint.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: You're Pallas. And... you're...
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: You're not very tall, and you don't come to the training grounds often. I don't remember you.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I'm Erato. I spend most of my time on field operations. We've only met a few times.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Oh, hello.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Right, Erato. Wanna fight?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Huh?! What's with this all of a sudden?!
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: If you don't want to, then never mind.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Sorry. I'm not very good at melee combat, but maybe I can challenge you at archery.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: It's fine.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: (Turns back to the sandbag)
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Ha!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: We'd best wait a little longer. Considering the time, there will be more operators here soon enough.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Erato?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I've heard about how strong Flint is, but this is the first time I've seen her fighting form in person.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: That valiant posture, those fierce blows... This is exactly what I am looking for...
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Flint, no, O Warrior Adept! I wish to learn of extraordinary deeds, and surely a hero such as you has many to her name. Might you indulge me in one or two?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Hero? I don't really get anything else you just said, but I've never even seen a hero.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: And these 'deeds' you're talking about... what're they even good for?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I'm looking for heroic deeds as inspiration, to help me write my next epic!
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Oh, I see. You want inspiration.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Come here, then.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Come. Stand here.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: This is a sandbag. Pound it.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Uh... Like this?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: That was too weak. Stronger.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Like this?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Still too weak. Try punching it harder.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Hah! Ow... that hurt...
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Yes, just like that! Did you feel anything?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Pain...
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: And?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Just pain...
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: No way. You didn't feel inspired?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Not at all.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Weird. Whenever I'm sparring I get super inspired, like I'll suddenly think of a feint I can work into a low jab.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Any kind of problem should be solved with your fists. Maybe you just need more practice fighting.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Come on, try it out a few more times.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Wait, let's stop here...
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Flint? Flint, are you there?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: I'm here.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Ah, Erato and Pallas are here too.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Flint, take a good look at this list of compensation expenses incurred from your last field mission. Logistics racked up a huge bill settling the problems you left behind.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: And this one line from your mission report: 'I knocked that tall guy down because he was looking down at me so fiercely.'
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: You didn't just 'knock him down,' you beat him up so badly he was rolling around in pain and even managed to smash through two doors!
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: No way, I was holding back. Come on, I only hit him twice...
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Anyway, I'm just advising you to be extra careful not damage public property while on missions, because if this happens again—
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: The sandbag......
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Exploded with one punch...
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Ah, forget it. Flint, this is for you.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: A thank you letter from the girl you saved on that last mission.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Oh, okay.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: (Stuffs the letter into her glove)
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I'll go get a new sandbag.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: It seems I've made the right choice, Erato.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Accompanying you on your journey has been far more gratifying than pouring myself another drink on the bridge.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Are all you priestesses like this, or are you just this boring, Miss 'Goddess of Victory'?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: I'm sure you know just how uniquely unparalleled I am.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: We've arrived our next destination.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: There's no shortage of brilliant engineers on Rhodes Island, so surely we'll be able to find a—
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Hey! Erato and Pallas? Giorno to the both of ya!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Hello, Chiave. Are you the only one in here?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Aosta was just here though? Huh, where'd he go?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Aosta? Where'd you go?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Wait, there's no need for that. I'll just talk to you.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: As I recall, you're... quite good at designing machines?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: 'Course I am. My modding skills are first-class, you could even call me a genius!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Wonderful. I'd like to ask you then, have you ever done anything you would consider heroic...?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Here, hold onto this for a sec.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...A hydraulic clamp?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: You're asking me about modding, right? When I was still learning how to fix cars, my mentor once told me that it's nice hearing how great something is, but nothing beats experiencing it for yourself.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: No, I just wanted to ask you about your own heroic deeds...
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Now hold on tight, I'll give you a demonstration.
attributes.name: Chiave
Erato
attributes.content: Of what...?

attributes.name: Erato
attributes.content: Ahhh!
Why, why am I flying?!
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: What do you think? My latest invention, a self-suspension hydraulic clamp!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I have to deal with a lot of heavy equipment here, and it's such a pain lugging my tools up and down the ladders every time!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: But now, with this baby, you can float up with them! No more ladders!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: It can fly even higher, so don't let go!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: I-Its vibrating quite a bit, is this normal?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Vibrating? ...Did I forget to install the motor rotor? Wait, did I even...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: It's going wild, I can't hold on any longer!
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Careful! It's flying towards you!
attributes.name: Erato
Chiave
attributes.content: Wha—

attributes.name: Chiave
attributes.content: Yow!
Ow ow ow! Ugh, my head...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: A malfunction? How did that happen? Weird, was the jet engine too powerful? Eh, screw it, I can think about it later.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You were asking me earlier if I've done any heroic deeds?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Well, I must proudly declare—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Nope!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: An unexpected answer.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Well, it's 'cause I give my all to my modded equipment.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: So they're the real heroes, the ones who've achieved plenty of unprecedented feats in my place! They're the ones everyone should remember!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: As for me, I invented them, so maybe you can call me... uh... a 'Hero Creator'?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Heh, I like the sound of that.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: 'Hero Creator'? Tsk.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Aosta! What's that 'tsk' supposed to mean, huh? You don't like it?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: What 'heroes' are you talking about? The drill that can sing, maybe the wrench that can dance?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Oh, now we have one more: a hydraulic clamp that can fly.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hey! How can you disrespect your boss like this?!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: According to my statistics, the last time you received a modding request was... three months back?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hey, you sure about that? I've got the feeling I did a real good job somewhere! Definitely!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Just admit it, Chiave. You're hopeless.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hey, this helmet on the table... I remember seeing it out on a field mission a while back.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: A defender operator was fuming: 'I only asked for my goggles to be fixed, but that guy added a whole bunch of extra functions!'
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: But during that same mission, the squad encountered an unexpected source of Originium pollution.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: They lacked proper Originium detection equipment, but the detector on the helmet managed to work and helped them avert a crisis.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Ya hear that, Aosta? I'm out there saving the day!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Then why did they send the helmet back?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Oh, as I recall, it started leaking electricity later in the mission...
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Anyway, I'll never give up on my creations, and my genius must stay unburied.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: For there will come a day when I myself will be worthy of being called a hero, and not just a 'Hero Creator' or whatever. Just you wait, Aosta!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Oh, I forgot you girls were still here. Sorry, Erato. I didn't have any of those heroic tales you wanted.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: It's fine.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: But I was thinking, if you wanted to ask someone else, I have someone in mind.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: And who might that be?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: My dear friend, Lancet-2!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: She's been down in the dumps lately, even though she's been working so hard.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: And while she's always been the negative sort... maybe she'd cheer up if you let her know all the heroic deeds she's done!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Alright, got it.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Come back and hang out if you have time, and let me know whenever if you need anything modded!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Erato, are you seriously considering Chiave's suggestion?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Of course. As it happens, my original plan also included paying a visit to the medics on board.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Do you think this 'quest' of yours, if you'll permit me such a word, will ultimately prove fruitful for your work?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I couldn't say.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: I've previously amassed a collection of legends and stories, and for the sake of preserving them properly, I will do my best to act as an earnest recorder.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: The key is to not let any subjective emotions and thoughts pollute the record, so that the stories maintain their original form.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Once this journey has concluded, everything I've seen, witnessed, heard, and recorded will gradually settle down within a few nights.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Then, it flows into poetry under my pen, and through my voice presents itself to the audience.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: The 'quest' is not yet over, though, so I can only speculate how it will end.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Recording, creating, eulogizing... you've given yourself far more duties to bear than a simple wandering bard.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I like to think of this as my passion.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Or perhaps it's your liberty.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: ...But I have a hunch that what I see and hear this time won't affect my creation all that much.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Before I was simply curious about your process, but now I've become quite interested in the poem you will write.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: We're here.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: What do I do... what do I do?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Hello, Lancet-2... what are you doing?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Hello. Based on the status displayed on my motion module, I am currently spinning in circles.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: I can see that, but... why?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Doctor... because of the Doctor.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Did something happen to them?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: No, it's my fault.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Because I am incompetent, useless, and can't do anything right.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Hold on, could you elaborate? What happened exactly?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Pallas, so you're saying if I hit her twice like this, she'll be able to speak normally?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: You can try.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Checking language module—operation will resume when the process is complete.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: The reason is that the Doctor has been so busy recently. They have so much paperwork to deal with every day, and are unable to go to bed until early morning.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: If this goes on, there will certainly be abnormalities in the results of their next physical examination.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: It's because I'm so bad at taking good care of them. It's all my fault—
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Stop right there.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: The Doctor has their own duties too, Lancet-2. Their work is very important to all of us here, so it's normal to be busy every now and then.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: You've been working hard, so you shouldn't blame yourself for the current situation, alright?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Really? Operator Erato, do you really think so?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Of course, I came here today just to ask for your help. May I ask if you have any heroic deeds to share with me?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Heroic deeds... I have overheard the chatter of the operators I look after, and even have some events saved in my memory module.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: No, no, no, not those. I want to know your own stories, especially the heroic ones.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: You do such brilliant work, so surely there would be many of them?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: My own heroic deeds... No, I don't think anything I've done could be called 'heroic,' and such a title doesn't suit me at all.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: In my line of work, you would only be a hero if you could take care of all the operators here and keep everyone healthy.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: But I haven't done such a deed; I can't even take good care of the Doctor... Perhaps I'm not even the least bit competent.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: She certainly is a negative one.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Alright, alright. How about this: could you take care of me for a bit?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Take care of you, Operator Erato? This is indeed with my scope of work, but... is there a reason why you want me to?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: So I can properly judge how good you are at it, and just maybe you'll also realize how useful you are in the process.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Understood. Please hold still for a moment, Operator Erato. I will conduct a full-body physical examination right away.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Examination—complete. The test results are as follows: Operator Erato has not slept for 27 hours, 13 minutes, and 27 seconds, and her body is in urgent need of rest.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: ...A few hours ago, you also ingested a large amount of sugar and fat.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Erato, I seem to recall you repeatedly declaring your intention to lose weight.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: ...It's all for the sake of the plan, the plan!
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: How could this happen? How did I not notice this abnormality until now?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: I should have noticed the moment you stepped in, but I was so busy handling my emotional module that I neglected you... I truly am incompetent.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: No, that's not your fault at all.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: I can't do even a single thing right. I should just drive myself over to the scrap area.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.options: Hello, Erato, Pallas.;So the both of you are here too.

attributes.content: Hello, Doctor.
attributes.name: Erato & Pallas

attributes.options: Lancet-2, I'm here for my examination.
You seem upset, something on your mind?

attributes.content: Doctor... I'm sorry, I haven't taken good care of you.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.options: But thanks to you, my results come back normal.

attributes.content: Huh, is that so?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: You run the examinations so quickly.
The results are here, and the data indicates—
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Everything normal. Wonderful.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.options: See, worrying over nothing.;There's absolutely no need to worry.

attributes.content: (The Doctor's coffee ration has been reduced, but they still consume it regularly.)
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: You're really great at your work, Lancet-2.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Oh, sorry, I was just thinking...
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Doctor, I have somewhere else to be, so I'll be going! Bye!
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: A week later
Oh, so it wasn't just me who received an invitation.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: An invitation to a 'poetry recital'... I don't get it, what's a 'poetry'?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Poetry is a form of literature that narrates events or expresses emotions in condensed and rhythmic language, and listeners can often feel enlightened by such recitals.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: This is the first public recital of Erato's latest work, which is expected to have a positive impact on the mental health of the operators present.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.options: Erato's new poem... Looking forward to it.

attributes.content: *Ahem*
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: (I did invite everyone, but I didn't expect so many to attend...)
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Thank you for coming to the recital of my latest poem. I dearly hope everyone has a pleasant time.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Alright, now let's get right to it. The poem that I will now recite is titled...
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: (Deep breath)
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: (Ah, I'm so nervous. The last time I recited a new poem in front of such a crowd was many years ago in Corinia's town square...)
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Erato! Erato!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Ahem, without further ado, I will recite my latest creation—
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: 'The Epic of Heroes.'
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.text: O distant sky up high,
Let us all sing under you,
The will of the masses.
In the far, far away of the lands beyond,
The mountains are but no more,
All that is left is a wasteland of gold sand and black gravel.
Civilization suffers under the whip,
Struggling like foam in wine,
Beasts unseen devour hearts still live.
On an unexpected summer night,
It happens.
Three heroes,
Rise from their kin who raised them,
And they swore to the sun,
To unshackle them,
And lead their peoples towards a land in full bloom.

attributes.content: Accompanied by the sound of the harp strings and Erato's gentle recital, the stories of the three heroes were told.

attributes.text: They hailed from the masses,
Not mighty,
Nor flawless.
An adept warrior, weak with words and quick to anger.
A genius smith, reckless and full of arrogance.
A gracious healer, low on esteem and high on negativity.
However, when beset with crisis without end,
The warrior is unafraid to face foes over twice their size.
The smith with their miracle tool saves the people from danger.
The healer strives their utmost to help everyone in need.
They hailed from the masses,
Not mighty,
Nor flawless.
Leading them all onwards.

attributes.content: Dawn lifts her veil, and the sun spills its radiance on the land, brushing off her dust-covered visage.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: A fragrance wafts from afar, and the people pick up their belongings, persisting on their journey.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Thank you everyone, thank you.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: The recital came to an end, and one by one the audience leaves reluctantly.
Well, Pallas. It's been three days since you've heard the poem, do you still have no thoughts on it?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: If I heard you right, that was just the first part of it.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: I must admit, it holds much of your personal style, but I will refrain from any further comments until it is finished.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: It must be pretty decent to get the always-chatty Pallas to hold her tongue.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: Rather bickering with you any further, I'd like to know how you plan to finish the rest of the poem. The material you've amassed surely isn't enough for the entire work?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Yes, I'm running empty on inspiration for now, so at the moment I'm just entertaining a concept in my head.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: I want to create a character based on myself, and walk together with the heroes in the story, to the land of my dreams brimming with flowers.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: I understand. Every Minoan dreams of walking alongside the heroes, after all.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: No... it's different this time. Remember what I said back then, that this creation wouldn't be the same as my previous works? But my creations have never varied much before, so why now?
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: While I was writing, I kept wondering where this premonition had come from, and only when I put down my pen did I realize that the change might have already happened, right in front of me.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: In my past journeys, I wrote myself into my stories, becoming a character, and anticipated creating the crystallization of my heart and soul, to act as a guide and inspiration to others.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: But after coming here and seriously observing everyone on Rhodes Island, I've discovered... that my poetry is resonating like never before.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: I think I already am among said heroes, walking alongside them.
attributes.name: Erato

attributes.content: ...I should write this down.
attributes.name: Erato
